title: Signum (sgn or sign) function - misc. additions

blocks.name: sgncl
blocks.content: Closure of the signum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Sep-2018.)

thm sgncl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))

  sgn0()

  mpjaodan(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, nat0), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wcel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  syl6eqel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cneg(nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  sgnn(c0)
  tpid1(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  negex(nat1)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  syl6eqel(cfv(csgn, c0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  sgnp(c0)

  mpanl2(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, nat0), wo(wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cxr))

blocks.name: sgn3da
blocks.content: A conditional containing a signum is true if it is true in all three possible cases. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), w2)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), w3)
